alert.note: Alert for Inland Broward County; Inland Palm Beach County; Metro Broward County (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 11 at 6:29PM EDT by NWS Miami
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northern Broward County through 700 PM EDT... At 629 PM EDT, National Weather Service meteorologists were tracking a strong thunderstorm near Intersection I-75 And U.S. 27, or 7 miles northwest of Sunrise, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Coral Springs, Plantation, Sunrise, Tamarac, Lauderhill, North Lauderdale, Parkland, Sawgrass Mills Mall, Intersection I-75 And U.S. 27 and Ramblewood East. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: These winds can down small tree limbs and branches, and blow around unsecured small objects. Seek shelter in a safe building until the storm passes. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Inland Broward County; Inland Palm Beach County; Metro Broward County
